post_text:
Congratulations to our Lady Jackets on advancing to the State Championship series in softball. Our team and coaches are excited about the opportunity that is ahead of them and the student body and fan base I'm sure are excited about coming out to cheer them on tonight. As with any event, we ask that great sportsmanship be displayed at all times by coaches, players and spectators.

With this opportunity to host 1 game during the championship series, we have a chance to showcase our school and community to visitors who may never return and who may have never been to Union before. Please keep this in mind. This is a great opportunity for our team and our community to showcase ourselves to another school and community in the state. Remember...great sportsmanship and class!!!

UC Softball will host Battery Creek tonight at 6:00 at Timken.

All State Championship game tickets are $8!

Again, Congratulations to our Lady Jackets! Let's have a huge crowd come out and support them tonight!!!
GO JACKETS!!!
